_header: Wherefore in this vale of misery do you abide
Subjects: translations; death, approach of; suffering, human; Paston, John, II; Paston, John, III
_description: On death, translating‘Cur in hac miseria miseri moramini’, which precede — four lines

CULIi49.Transcription:
Wherefor in this vale of myserye do you abydeWherefor haue yowe
                    plaisur in this vnclene Ioyeyow that dey all thyngys yowe leueDeth
                    weche spare no man taketh away yower ioye
